lesson.title: SQL vs NoSQL Database Selection
lesson.summary: Understanding when to use relational databases versus NoSQL databases based on data structure, consistency, and scalability requirements.
lesson.real_world_example: Facebook uses MySQL for user data and Cassandra for messaging due to different consistency requirements
